Source for species occurrence information

GBIF.org (26th September 2016) GBIF Occurrence Download.

Reptiles Reptiles of Europe Arnold & Ovenden (2002)
Turtles (non-marine) Turtles of the World Bonin et al. (2006)
Amphibians IUCN Amphibian Range Maps IUCN (2015)

Sources of taxonomic information

Vertebrates
Species group Master taxonomy Additional sources of names Geographical coverage
Birds BirdLife 2011 Avibase 2010 & 2016, GBIF 2012 & 2016, range maps by Jetz et al. 2012 Global
Mammals IUCN 2010 Wilson & Reeder 2012, IUCN 2015 & 2016, COL 2012, GBIF 2012 & 2016 Global
Reptiles Uetz 2016 IUCN 2015 & 2016, GBIF 2016, Wilson & Swan 2013, Arnold & Ovenden 2002, Spawls et al. 2002 Several continents and subcontinents
Turtles Uetz 2016 IUCN 2016, GBIF 2016, range maps by Bonin et al. 2006 Global
Amphibians Frost 2012 IUCN 2010, 2015 & 2016, COL 2012, GBIF 2012 & 2016 Global
Invertebrates
Species group Master taxonomy Additional sources of names Geographical coverage
Butterflies G. Lamas (unpubl.) NHML Butterfly/Moth Genera, LepIndex, IUCN 2016, GBIF 2016, COL 2016, various literature sources, range maps by Braby 2000, Peña & Ugarte 1996, Tolman 2008, Glasberg 2007, Scott 1986, Tshikolovets 2002 & 2003, Woodhall 2005 Several continents and subcontinents
Bumblebees Williams IUCN 2016, range maps by Williams 2014, Rasmont & Iserbyt 2014 Europe, North America
Dragonflies & damselflies Schorr & Paulson Boudot & Kalkman, GBIF 2016, IUCN 2016, COL 2016, range maps by Dijkstra & Lewington 2006, Paulson 2009 & 2011, Kipping & Dijkstra 2016 Africa, Europe, North America
Plants
Species group Master taxonomy Additional sources of names Geographical coverage

Conifers The Plant List (with additions from iPlant TNRS) 2014 Leslie 2014 Global
Palms The Plant List (with additions from iPlant TNRS) 2014 Kreft et al. 2006 New World
Cacti The Plant List (with additions from iPlant TNRS) 2014 The Plants List 2016, iPlant TNRS 2014 & 2016, GBIF 2014 & 2016, Feeley 2014, range maps by Barthlott et al. 2015 Global
